targets.Name: Booster
targets.bannerText: The booster seat is not secured.
postText: An empty booster seat must be properly seatbelted so itâ€™s not a projectile.
targets.hint: I'm soft but shed all over
Text: FURRY PET (Ex: Dogs, Cats, Hamsters, Guinea Pigs, and Rabbits) are common pet allergens that can trigger asthma symptoms in some people.Pet hair and dander, especially cat hair, can fly in the air and land on surfaces throughout the house...
